reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater's style versatile, with one noting it can be styled in multiple ways, and appreciate its quality, fit, and softness with blended materials.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super soft and true to size
items.body: I looove this vest. It’s beautiful and practical. It however arrived shrink wrapped so tightly that it is full of deep marks. I am going to gently wash it to see if they come out. I am extremely annoyed that I can enjoy it before it pills because of this. Because this is polyester it will pill. So having to wash it to take these deep fold marks off of it (which I don’t see happened to any other one pictured!) is a big let down. I will admit that non the less I have ordered four more. I tend to get cold while at my desk and because of the functional side buttons, I can gracefully wear these without the vest being stretched out around my hips. An issue than any woman with slightly big hips here will immediately understand! As far as fit, I do believe it’s true to size. You have to decide if you want it way bigger at the top around your chest in order to wear it with the buttons closed (if you have hips like I do), or if you are ok leaving the bottom button undone. Because the top part is in fact a bit loose. It is super comfortable and the weight of the material feels great! 1st Update: Look at the second picture. I washed it inside out in a bag, alone in the washing machine in a “delicates” cycle. I’ve laid it out to dry in a towel. And I can still see the creces of the folds it had in the shrink wrapped package! I’ll update once again when it’s dry. Read more
items.author: Ann

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is as pictured. Beautiful!
items.body: Love this. It’s soft and comfortable. It irons well on steam to get wrinkles out. Good quality. Easy to wear with all kind of shirts underneath. I typically wear a small but purchased a medium because it’s being worn over a shirt. Recommend. UPDATE: Wash on gentle cycle/ cold water. This will pill. Iron worked well but after I washed it it took more effort to get the wrinkles out. I’m guessing it’d be best to dry flat. Read more
items.author: Donna H.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great quality…
items.body: I think this best would be good for layering. I purchased my regular size which is medium and it fits well. It’s very soft to the touch and looks as photo (I got gray). While I like it, I’m not sure o like it enough to get other colors. It just arrived today so I haven’t styled it yet; maybe that will make a difference. Overall it’s a keeper. Read more
items.author: Bronx Bombshell

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Runs large for me but a keeper! LOVE LOVE LOVE
items.body: I ordered the medium first, as what was recommended and is my usual size. (I am 5'4/124 pounds). It fit large esp in waist area and felt frumpy. ..... I returned for a small and it will work. It is still a bit large (x-small would probably have worked but will allow for shrinkage) ..... Plus didn't want to do another return. Appears to be well made, love the buttons on sides... I haven't laundered it yet so can't vouch for how that will go. (I think the color could have been a been a bit more brown, but it's ok and that's just me/picky). I put this with a darker brown pants, white blouse and it looked nice, Annie Hall-ish type. I like tailored things and this fits that bill. It would also go well with black pants or denims/white shirt. Will be a good casual 'fit for fall/winter.:) EDIT: I have worn this as described above (white long sleeved blouse, brown pants or jeans) and received sooo many compliments on it. Just in time for the popularity of the brown shades for winter months! Read more
items.author: Dee Dee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, well made and very versatile
items.body: I love this sweater vest. And will purchase another one in a different color. It is well-made, very soft, the buttons are very secure on the sides and looks great with just about everything. This is one of those vests that you could probably wear year-round depending on your climate. It looks cute with a short sleeve T-shirt for spring summer or fall and long sleeves for the cooler times. Read more
items.author: Leslie

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice vest, but had to return.
items.body: I first ordered a large, my usual Amazon size, but it was too big. I then ordered a medium, and it fits nicely, but there’s a discolored line down the front. I thought it was a crease, but it’s not. Read more
items.author: Nancy N.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved the red
items.body: Fit great! Looked great with blouse. Needs some pressing/steaming to get the packing wrinkles out Read more
items.author: PATTIO

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Recommend ordering a size up
items.body: Bought 2 colors. They are nicely made, look good with a smooth layer underneath, and both kept their shape after washing. Size tends to run a little smaller than expected so would recommend ordering a size up to accommodate layering. Read more
items.author: JVan

short_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Navy, Pink, White, Beige, Blue, Yellow, Black, Orange, Chirstmas Red, Green, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
